thread.title: Left behind: New Zealand's homeless crisis

title: Left behind: New Zealand's homeless crisis
text:
Left behind: New Zealand's homeless crisis 5:02pm BST - 01:59
New Zealand's economic golden run has fueled an unexpected crisis: homelessness. Reuters’ Jonathan Barrett lays out the government’s challenges in trying to help the tens of thousands of people with nowhere to live. Eve Johnson reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
New Zealand's economic golden run has fueled an unexpected crisis: homelessness. Reuters’ Jonathan Barrett lays out the government’s challenges in trying to help the tens of thousands of people with nowhere to live. Eve Johnson reports.
